transport.question: I have wheels, but I'm not a car. I'm powered by your feet and you steer me with your hands. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You have to balance to use me.
👧👦 Many children have one.
🚴 You pedal to make it go.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and carry many people. I often go underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You might use me in a big city.
📣 I often make a loud noise when I arrive.
🛤️ I follow a specific path.

transport.question: I float on water, but I'm not a duck. I carry people and cargo across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am much bigger than a rowboat.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place.
🚢 Some are very large and can hold many cars.

transport.question: I can fly high in the sky, but I'm not a bird. I carry people to faraway places quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings, but they don't flap.
✈️ You need a ticket to ride me.
💺 I have many seats inside.

transport.question: I have a horn and flashing lights, and help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud siren sound.
👨‍⚕️ I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I am always in a hurry!

transport.question: I have a long body and carry lots of people. I stop frequently to pick up and drop off passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I use bus stops.
🚌 You pay a fare to ride me.
🛣️ I travel on roads.

transport.question: I can travel to the moon, but I’m not a planet. I carry astronauts into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I use powerful engines to escape Earth's gravity.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts wear special suits when they travel in me.
🪐 I explore other planets.

transport.question: I have two wheels and an engine, and you wear a helmet to ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle, but smaller than a car.
🛣️ You need a license to drive me on the road.
🧑‍✈️ I have handle bars that you use to steer.

transport.question: I carry goods across long distances, and I am very big. I’m also sometimes called a lorry. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry packages.
🚚 I have many wheels to support my weight.
🛣️ I travel on highways to deliver things.

transport.question: I fly low to the ground, and my blades spin around very fast. I can land almost anywhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I don't need a runway to take off or land.
🚁 I have a large propeller on top.
🩺 You may see me transporting someone to the hospital in an emergency.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I often live in gardens. What am I?

hints.text: 🪲 I'm small and an insect.
🌿 I can be found on plants.
🐜 Some of my relatives live in big groups underground.

bug.question: I have wings and love flowers. I make a sweet treat that you can eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I visit flowers to get food.
🐝 I am a flying insect.
🍯 I create something delicious!

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then change into something beautiful that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I am young.
🦋 I go through a big change.
🌈 I have colorful wings.

bug.question: I jump really high and eat plants. I'm usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have strong legs.
🌱 I enjoy munching on greens.
🎶 You might hear me chirping in a field.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm small and round.
🍀 Many people think of me as lucky!
⚫️ I often have black spots on a red body.

bug.question: I fly around at night and light up. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I produce light.
🌃 You'll usually only see me after the sun sets.
✨ My light helps me find a mate.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food, but I'm not an insect because I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is sticky.
🕷️ I'm an arachnid, not an insect.
🕸 I can be found in corners of rooms.

bug.question: I make a loud buzzing sound and sometimes bite. I love to hang around water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 My buzzing can be annoying.
🩸 I drink blood.
💧 I lay my eggs in water.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I can look like a leaf or a twig to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I blend in with my surroundings.
🌳 I am long and slender.
🍃 I can be green or brown.

bug.question: I live in a colony with millions of others just like me. We work together to build amazing structures and protect our queen. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 We serve our queen.
🏗️ We are very good at building.
🐜 We are a social insect.
